name: Deft Hands
description: All weapons gain +10% Rate of Fire (additive)

name: Absorption
description: Release a &type="bold_it"&col="20AC20"10 (+1%&space&img="misc_big,40") Health&reset healing blast for your party when receiving Physical or Magic Damage above 100 in a single hit

name: Veil of Shadows
description: Receive Invisibility after 90 seconds of not attacking and not taking damage. Doing either breaks this effect and resets the timer
